activities: The respondent enters data on www.inscape-epic.com and www.wiley-epic.com  for the purpose of generating a personalized report. They will be required to provide first and last name and respond to a series of questions, words, or statements that will be used to create a customized report. Optionally, they can provide demographic information such as age, location, education, and employment that will be used by Inscape Publishing, LLC, a subsidiary of John Wiley & Sons, Inc (Wiley)for continued validation of this report. We also collect an email address to assist in the delivery of the report to the respondent. On https://myeverythingdisc.com users enter the name of their organization. This is used exclusively to help other participants identify each other for the purpose of sending invitations to colleagues to run comparison reporting.
contactoff1: Inscape Publishing, LLC, a subsidiary of John Wiley & Sons, Inc (Wiley)
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
